name: Rope Dungeon
description:
ROPE DUNGEON Rope Dungeon is a game jam production made in barely 10 days for the 8th BlackAndWhite Game Jam. The theme was "Loop". Controls:

WASD, arrow keys or left Joystick to move. 

R to reset level

Description:

In Rope Dungeon, you complete levels by making rope loops. The rope follows the player around, and can attach to walls and connect to poles. When a loop is connected, the door opens and you are free to continue on your merry way! Be careful for spikes as they snap your rope and kill you! Good luck, you'll need it :)
